This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the upgrade of a research and development centre to meet fire evacuation standards. Works to be carried out include installing and relocating exit signs, removing existing equipment, and installing new hardware and patching doors situated in Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec, Canada.
